headline: YouTube Autodeletes Comments with Links
description:
I haven't been able to post this link <https://physics.stackexchange.com/questions/197397/misconceptions-about-the-universe-hubble-sphere> in a youtube comment, youtube deletes it in ~30 seconds

Though I did manage to post an answer-link here: (first comment) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q67vH0SKahU&lc=UgyQizABsao1A9EWtlF4AaABAg . But I haven't been able to replicate this

Anybody knows what's going on?, why that one got posted and the others didn't?

I rarely make comments, less than once a month, and I never use insults, I think I'm very polite and conservative when I critic something, so I don't think is related to my account
headline_zh-Hans: YouTube自动删除有链接的评论
headline_zh-Hant: YouTube自動刪除有鏈接的評論
description_zh-Hans:
我一直无法在youtube的评论中发布这个链接<https://physics.stackexchange.com/questions/197397/misconceptions-about-the-universe-hubble-sphere>，youtube在~30秒内就把它删除了

不过我还是设法在这里发布了一个答案-链接。(第一个评论) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q67vH0SKahU&lc=UgyQizABsao1A9EWtlF4AaABAg 。但我无法复制这一点

有谁知道这是怎么回事？
description_zh-Hant:
我一直無法在youtube的評論中發佈這個鏈接<https://physics.stackexchange.com/questions/197397/misconceptions-about-the-universe-hubble-sphere>，youtube在~30秒內就把它刪除了

不過我還是設法在這裡發佈了一個答案-鏈接。(第一個評論) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q67vH0SKahU&lc=UgyQizABsao1A9EWtlF4AaABAg 。但我無法複製這一點

有誰知道這是怎麼回事？
